channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to The CouRage and Nadeshot Show where 100 Thieves CEO Matt "Nadeshot" Haag and Jack "CouRageJD" Dunlop bring on some of the top names in entertainment to talk about the latest in pop culture, gaming, and whatever else comes to their minds. ------ New episodes every other Thursday ------ Watch the video versions of the podcasts: https://youtube.com/channel/UCm63ADlzvTyQWAzTzCHxa6A?sub_confirmation=1
